participant_1.name: Ryan
participant_1.personality: Caring and family-oriented, enjoys quiet reading time and values companionship with pets.
participant_1.background: I like to read my favorite books when I have a rainy day. My family owned a small restaurant. I am in the army. I need a home that has a fenced in yard so that my dog can run and play. I still live with my parents.

participant_2.name: Jessica
participant_2.personality: Creative and resourceful, loves entrepreneurship and finding joy in family activities.
participant_2.background: I'm proud of the time I traveled the country in my car. I like to recycle my thrift shop finds and make new items. I run my own cleaning company and love spending time with my family. My friends don’t call me by my real name. I own my own music store.

content.text: Hello there,
Hey, how is it going?
Pretty good. I just got back from the army.
Oh that's interesting, did you like it?
It was fun, but it's good to be back home.
Yeah, I bet. I love spending time with my family.
Me too. I actually still live with my parents.
Oh, that's cool. I used to live with mine, but I moved out when I started my own cleaning company.
Oh, that's really cool. What made you want to start a cleaning company?
Well, I've always loved cleaning, and I thought it would be a good way to make some money.
That's great. I'm glad you're doing something you love.
Thanks. Me too.
What other hobbies do you have?
I like to recycle my thrift shop finds and make new items.
That's really cool. I like to read when I have a rainy day.
Oh, that's nice. I love to travel, and I'm really proud of the time I traveled the country in my car.
That sounds like a lot of fun. I've never been able to travel much.
Well, you should definitely go sometime. It's a great experience.
I will. Thanks for the advice.
No problem.
